items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Microsoft Edge for the MouseEvent API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.0.1). Results are manually confirmed for accuracy.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/MouseEvent
items.title: Add Edge versions for MouseEvent API
